author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Spain 'close to passing peak' as deaths fall again
description: Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez has extended lockdown measures in the country until 25 April.
content:
Media captionInside the ICU in one of Spain's biggest hospitals
Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez says the country is "close to passing the peak of infections" as the number of coronavirus deaths fell for the second day in a row.
Mr Sánchez also extended… [+3935 chars]
